data.text: @wanganuiorg Also, are you seriously complaining about the fact that the "2.5 years [huh?] of crap" actually worked and kept deaths low? Would you be less upset if NZ had 10,000 deaths instead? Which would *still* be a lower death rate than the US...

@wanganuiorg Or you could look at what was *actually* said, namely that these 34 people were included in the death count *despite* their death being beyond the normal 28 day "window", due to the deaths being clearly from Covid: https://t.co/kNb4LzxcSG
@wanganuiorg Ableist 😆 I’m “disabled” in some ways and I can’t stand these idiots using the term every 5 minutes

@wanganuiorg This is the change in the reporting that was bound to come when it was politically desirable to minimise covid deaths. Entirely predictable and rotten. If you reported deaths of all infected as covid deaths for the last two years you should report them now.
